name: 重返越南
description:
"Back to Vietnam" is a first-person shooting game, where you can experience the beautiful scenery of Vietnam and feel the harmonious humanistic atmosphere. Attention, there are many dangers in the battlefield. It is most important to persist in living. Take your weapons and open up a path!

In the game, you can use the weapons of the 1960s and 1970s to fight. AI has highly intelligent thinking and marksmanship, and your enemy is very strong! They will also hide in the grass, just like you think - hide and sneak attack you. In the game, you can drive armed helicopters UH1 and tanks to the battlefield, and more vehicles will join in the future!

2023 is about to launch: new maps, AI evolution!
